review: Anyone having problems with Fresh installs of Windows 10 Pre ' The exception unknow software exception (0xc06d007e) occurred in the application at location 0x750fc42d.' Just copy the game to a different Hard Drive and it will work. Any further issues run in compatability with Windows 8-XP SP3 and Run As Admin.10/10 best Zombie survival game, Constant updates and new features on a month to month basis. This game is a must buy if you love survival games!
